issue.title: Error starting ftcsim: Cannot locate material called 'Gazebo/shadow_caster'

content.raw:
I have the same problem.  I tried this on 32-bit and 64-bit 12.04 running ROS Groovy and Fuerte, respectively.  Both throw different errors, but here's what one gives:

Error [RTShaderSystem.cc:408] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException'
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Cannot locate material called 'Gazebo/shadow_caster' in SceneManager::setShadowTextureCasterMaterial at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 5833)
Error [RTShaderSystem.cc:408] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.Xlib:  extension "RANDR" missing on display ":0".
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException'
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Cannot locate material called 'Gazebo/shadow_caster' in SceneManager::setShadowTextureCasterMaterial at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 5833)
[gazebo-2] process has finished cleanly
log file: /home/simstation/.ros/log/bbd45740-1c9f-11e3-9e58-10bf48e15077/gazebo-2*.log

What happened to my original files?  They were working well.
content.html:
I have the same problem. I tried this on 32-bit and 64-bit 12.04 running ROS Groovy and Fuerte, respectively. Both throw different errors, but here's what one gives:

Error [RTShaderSystem.cc:408] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException' what(): OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Cannot locate material called 'Gazebo/shadow_caster' in SceneManager::setShadowTextureCasterMaterial at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 5833) Error [RTShaderSystem.cc:408] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.Xlib: extension "RANDR" missing on display ":0". terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException' what(): OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Cannot locate material called 'Gazebo/shadow_caster' in SceneManager::setShadowTextureCasterMaterial at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 5833) [gazebo-2] process has finished cleanly log file: /home/simstation/.ros/log/bbd45740-1c9f-11e3-9e58-10bf48e15077/gazebo-2*.log

What happened to my original files? They were working well.
